# Statistical design:

* Experimental design:

<!-- ## Sample sheet overview -->

```{r Design, echo=FALSE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE}

DT::datatable(as.data.frame(rflomics.MAE@colData), 
              options = list(rownames = FALSE, pageLength = 6, scrollX = T, dom = 'tip'),
              class = 'cell-border stripe')

```

* Factor settings:

```{r factors, echo=FALSE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE}

fact.names <- names(rflomics.MAE@metadata$design@Factors.Type)
fact.types <- rflomics.MAE@metadata$design@Factors.Type
fact.ref <- vector()
for(i in 1:length(fact.names)){
  fact.ref[i] <- levels(rflomics.MAE@metadata$design@ExpDesign[,fact.names[i]])[1]
}

df <- data.frame("Factor.names" = fact.names ,
           "Factor.Type" = fact.types,
           "Ref.modality" = fact.ref)

DT::datatable(df , rownames = FALSE ,options = list( pageLength = 6, scrollX = F, dom = 'tip'),
              class = 'cell-border stripe')
```
